body:
Dear technical support,
 there is a flow in ANOW running for longer than 3 hours. 
 Please login to ANOW, check the flow and take necessary actions if needed. 

Workflow type: ${TOP_PART} 
Workflow ID: ${SC_RUN_ID#} 
Workflow instance: ${tags} 

JDAProcessAssistant
 ---this message was generated by ANOW for JDA do not answer---
title: <ACTION REQUIRED> ANOW - Long running flow
